"Karin":
"Wow, you sure did a good job!
You've managed to complete all of the Stages!
We've also got a heap of wonderful data from it!"

"Ah, by the way. Next time you do an
Extreme Quest, it'll start from the
first stage again! Just letting you know! "

"But in exchange for starting over,
we're giving you a ton of Spellstones!
So try your best next time too, okay?"

"In any case! You also get to take
items corresponding to the amount
of Stage Orders you completed!"

"Pick whichever items you'd like
from the Extreme Terminal.
Now then. Good work!"

"Also, as a service to you we're also going to give
you catalysts to change the Spellstones into
other types of Spellstones!"
